import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './Movies.css' import FavoriteIcon from '../../images/favorite-icon.png' import ListIcon from '../../images/list.png' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const favoritePath = { favorite: 's', unfavorite: 'r' } const MovieCard = (props) => { const [clicked, setClicked] = useState(false) let movieFav = [] return (

{props.title}

) } export default MovieCard
